trans-unit.source: Represents a [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element in a project.
Adds an [Output](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element with the specified `TaskParameter` and `ItemName` attributes to the [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TaskParameter" name="TaskParameter" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Output" name="Output" href=""></xref> element.
The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemName" name="ItemName" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Output" name="Output" href=""></xref> element.
Adds an [Output](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element with the specified `TaskParameter` and `PropertyName` attributes to the [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TaskParameter" name="TaskParameter" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Output" name="Output" href=""></xref> element.
The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_PropertyName" name="PropertyName" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Output" name="Output" href=""></xref> element.
Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
The `Condition` attribute value of the `Task` element.
Gets or sets the `ContinueOnError` attribute value of the [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
The `ContinueOnError` attribute value of the `Task` element.
Runs the task represented by this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an array containing the parameter names passed to the task.
The returned array excludes the `Condition` and `ContinueOnError` parameters.
If no parameters are passed to the task, this method returns an empty array.
An array containing the parameter names passed to the task.
Gets the value of the specified task parameter.
The parameter name.
The value of the specified task parameter.
Gets or sets the host object associated with the task.
The host object associated with the task.
Gets the task name.
The task name.
Sets the value of the specified task parameter.
The parameter name to set.
The value to assign to `parameterName`.
Sets the value of the specified task parameter.
The parameter name to set.
The value to assign to `parameterName`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat `parameterValue` as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the class that implements the task.
The <xref:System.Type> of the class that implements the task.
